name: @saekitominaga/document-generate-id
description: Generate a unique ID in Document.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/DocumentId.js -- brotlin compress dist/DocumentId.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/DocumentId.js -- terser dist/DocumentId.js -o dist/DocumentId.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/DocumentId.js.map',filename='DocumentId.js',includeSources,url='DocumentId.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/DocumentId.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/DocumentId.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/DocumentId.d.ts -- cpy dist/DocumentId.d.ts dist --rename=DocumentId.min.d.ts
